name: Retro Rainbow
description: An experiment with Javscript, jQuery, and color combinations.

name: React Pokedex
description: This small site took a day to build and uses React as well as a couple of API calls to simulate a Pokedex of the original 151 Pokemon. Add Pokemon to your team and asemble your favorites in this one page app!

name: Responsive Web Design Exercise
description: An exercise done in class to learn the finer points of responsive design using media queries alongside CSS Grid and Flexbox.

name: Bootstrap Album Site
description: Practicing my Bootstrap skills by recreating this photo album landing page.
